name: display avg
create Alpaca buy or sell order
trading interval
export query
The  sample size is the key variable for SMA of lasttrades
prepare cancel order
insert into order_confirms table
func:
let id = msg.payload["id"]
let client_order_id = msg.payload["client_order_id"]
let created_at = msg.payload["created_at"]
let updated_at = msg.payload["updated_at"]
let submitted_at = msg.payload["submitted_at"]
let filled_at = msg.payload["filled_at"]
let expired_at = msg.payload["expired_at"]
let canceled_at = msg.payload["canceled_at"]
let failed_at = msg.payload["failed_at"]
let replaced_at = msg.payload["replaced_at"]
let replaced_by = msg.payload["replaced_by"]
let replaces = msg.payload["replaces"]
let asset_id = msg.payload["asset_id"]
let symbol = msg.payload["symbol"]
let asset_class = msg.payload["asset_class"]
let notional = msg.payload["notional"]
let qty = msg.payload["qty"]
let filled_qty = msg.payload["filled_qty"]
let filled_avg_price = msg.payload["filled_avg_price"]
let order_class = msg.payload["order_class"]
let order_type = msg.payload["order_type"]
let type = msg.payload["type"]
let side = msg.payload["side"]
let time_in_force = msg.payload["time_in_force"]
//let limit_price = msg.payload["limit_price"]
let limit_price = flow.get("price")

let stop_price = msg.payload["stop_price"]
let status = msg.payload["status"]
let extended_hours = msg.payload["extended_hours"]
let legs = msg.payload["legs"]
let trail_percent = msg.payload["trail_percent"]
let trail_price = msg.payload["trail_price"]
let hwm = msg.payload["hwm"]
let subtag = msg.payload["subtag"]
let source = msg.payload["source"]

subtag = flow.get("algo_name")
if ( source === null){ source = 0}
let result = symbol.includes("/");
if (result == true) {
    symbol = symbol.replace("/","")
}

let sql = "insert into order_confirms(id, client_order_id, created_at, updated_at, submitted_at, asset_id, symbol, asset_class, qty, order_type, limit_price, type, side, time_in_force, status, subtag, source,extended_hours) values "
sql += "('" + id + "', '" + client_order_id + "', '" + created_at + "', '" + updated_at + "', '" + submitted_at + "', '" + asset_id + "', '" + symbol + "', '" + asset_class + "', '" + qty + "', '" + order_type + "', '" + limit_price + "', '" + type + "', '" + side + "', '" + time_in_force + "', '" + status + "', '" + subtag + "', '" + source + "', '" + extended_hours + "'); " 

msg.query = sql
//node.warn(msg.query)
msg.id = id
node.warn("set orderid: " +msg.id)
return msg;

name: Get current price of the asset from Polygon
Get lasttrades
display price
trading interval
define values required for adding trade to portfolio
func:
// create a unique algo_id with current unixtime
let d = Date.now()

msg.id = d
msg.login = global.get("login")
msg.ticker = flow.get("symbol")
msg.algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")
msg.asset_class = 'stocks'
msg.number = 1
msg.target = ''
msg.account = flow.get("account")
msg.psize = flow.get("psize")
msg.status = 'running'
msg.algo_type = 'intraday'
msg.benchmark = 'SPY'

return msg;

name: delete from tickers
func:
let id = msg.id
let symbol = msg.ticker
let portfolioname = msg.algo_name
msg.query = "delete from tickers_" +msg.account+ " where symbol like '" +symbol+ "';"
node.warn(msg.query)
msg.symbol = symbol
return msg;

name: delete existing algo
func:
msg.algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")
msg.query = "delete from algos where algo_name = '" +msg.algo_name+ "';"
node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;

name: insert into tickers_paper
func:
let id = msg.id
let symbol = msg.symbol
let portfolioname = msg.algo_name
msg.query = "insert into tickers_" +msg.account+ " (id, symbol, portfolioname) values (" + id + ",'" + symbol + "', '" + portfolioname + "') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;"
node.warn(msg.query)
msg.symbol = symbol
return msg;

name: add values to algos table
func:
let id = msg.id
let ticker = msg.tickers
let algo_name = msg.algo_name
let login = msg.login
let asset_class = msg.asset_class
let number = msg.number
let target = msg.target
let account = msg.account
let psize = msg.psize
let algo_type = msg.algo_type
let status = msg.status
let benchmark = msg.benchmark

let benchmark_start = global.get("spy_current")
let sql = "insert into algos (login,id,account,algo_name,algo_type,status,portfolio_size,benchmark,benchmark_start) values "
sql += "('" + login + "','" + id + "','" + account + "','" + algo_name + "','" + algo_type + "','" + status + "','" + psize + "','" + benchmark + "','" + benchmark_start + "') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;"
msg.query = sql
node.warn(msg.query)

return msg;

name: Store Flow Variables
func:
let d = new Date().toJSON().slice(0, 10);
//node.warn(d)

// enter desired values below
msg.symbol = 'TSLA'
msg.window = 100 // lookback window
msg.cnt = 1 // get most recent value
msg.timestamp = d
//msg.timespan = 'minute'
msg.algo_name = "Trade TSLA on Last Trade SMA [LIVE]"
msg.psize = 170 // size of portfolio
msg.size = 1 // shares to trade
msg.account = 'live'
msg.buydiff = -0.10
msg.selldiff = 0.10
msg.profittarget = 0.20
msg.losstarget = -.05 
return msg;
